(72853, 76144).description: The release of greenhouse gases, such as carbon dioxide and methane, into the atmosphere, contributing to climate change

(72853, 76144).name: climate change
(72853, 76144).label: natural hazard
(72853, 76144).description: A long-term change in the Earth's climate, resulting in rising temperatures, more frequent natural disasters, and other environmental impacts

(72853, 76144).name: agricultural fields
(72853, 76144).label: location
(72853, 76144).description: Areas of land used for growing crops and raising livestock

(75543, 78783).name: global climate change
(75543, 78783).label: weather event

(75543, 78783).name: salinity
(75543, 78783).label: variable
(75543, 78783).description: The concentration of dissolved salts in soil or water, affecting plant growth and microbial activity

(75543, 78783).name: drought
(75543, 78783).label: natural hazard
(75543, 78783).description: A prolonged period of abnormally low rainfall, causing water scarcity and impacts on ecosystems and agriculture

(75543, 78783).name: transcriptomics
(75543, 78783).label: instrument
(75543, 78783).description: The study of the complete set of RNA transcripts produced by an organism, used to understand gene expression and regulation

(75543, 78783).name: metabolomics
(75543, 78783).label: instrument
(75543, 78783).description: The study of the complete set of metabolites produced by an organism, used to understand metabolic pathways and responses to environmental changes

(75543, 78783).name: proteomics
(75543, 78783).label: instrument
(75543, 78783).description: The study of the complete set of proteins produced by an organism, used to understand protein function, structure, and interactions

(75543, 78783).name: microbiome
(75543, 78783).label: location
(75543, 78783).description: The community of microorganisms living in a particular environment, such as soil, plant roots, or the human gut

(75543, 78783).name: machine learning
(75543, 78783).label: model
(75543, 78783).description: A subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn from data and improve their performance over time

(78271, 81372).name: machine learning
(78271, 81372).label: model
